channel.title: Milestone v0.6
channel.description:
**Tag :** [v0.6](https://forum.mesg.com/tags/v0-6) **Due date:** 21 December 2018
# Main features
- [\*] @krhubert https://forum.mesg.com/t/configuring-services-with-deploy-time-or-run-time-arguments/124 - [ ] @ilgooz https://forum.mesg.com/t/add-more-detailed-data-in-the-mesg-yml/126
# Bugs
- [ ] @Nicolas [fix LICENCE by adding company info](https://github.com/mesg-foundation/core/issues/353) - [ ] [Concurrency issue when starting service](https://github.com/mesg-foundation/core/issues/538) - [ ] @krhubert [interface/grpc/core: ListenTask gets canceled](https://github.com/mesg-foundation/core/issues/549) - [\*] [service execute command hangs forever on unexpected data type](https://github.com/mesg-foundation/core/issues/573) - [\*] [Core shouldn't allow multiple output for the same execution](https://github.com/mesg-foundation/core/issues/610) - [ ] [Volume are not compatible with CircleCI](https://github.com/mesg-foundation/core/issues/621) - [ ] [sync completion of executions](https://github.com/mesg-foundation/core/issues/637)
# Discussions
- [ ] [protobuf: have error field in EventData (event stream)](https://github.com/mesg-foundation/core/issues/600) - [ ] @krhubert [Command service delete, improve tests](https://github.com/mesg-foundation/core/issues/622) - [\*] [Service.configuration is duplicated in Service.dependencies](https://forum.mesg.com/t/service-configuration-is-duplicated-in-service-dependencies/143)

item.title: Milestone v0.6
item.dc:creator: Nicolas
item.description:
Tag : v0.6
Due date: 21 December 2018

Main features

  • @krhubert Configuring Services with Deploy-Time or Run-Time Arguments
  • @ilgooz Add more detailed data in the mesg.yml

Bugs

  • @Nicolas fix LICENCE by adding company info
  • Concurrency issue when starting service
  • @krhubert interface/grpc/core: ListenTask gets canceled
  • service execute command hangs forever on unexpected data type
  • Core shouldn’t allow multiple output for the same execution
  • Volume are not compatible with CircleCI
  • sync completion of executions

Discussions

  • protobuf: have error field in EventData (event stream)
  • @krhubert Command service delete, improve tests
  • Service.configuration is duplicated in Service.dependencies

Read full topic
